name: Youthful Balance All Natural Small Batch Soap
description: Discover the rejuvenating power of Youthful Balance All Natural Small Batch Soap from Earth Chick US. Made with a charcoal soap base and enriched with dehydrated organic pineapple powdered, dehydrated organic apple powdered, Ylang Ylang essential oil, gompherna, and vitamin E, this soap is designed to nourish your skin for a healthy glow. These ingredients have been said to hydrate your skin, fight free radicals that cause fine lines and wrinkles, and exfoliate gently. Experience naturally balanced and revitalized skin with our thoughtfully crafted formula. Embrace the purity of nature with Earth Chick US's commitment to all-natural skincare.
